ygData.subject: Post about lvl 49 song
ygData.msgSnippet: I found this on the Gameplay Forum.  The original post brought up the issue of bard songs refreshing then immediately expiring and the lvl 49 song. ... I ve
ygData.messageBody:
I found this on the Gameplay Forum. The original post brought up the
issue of bard songs refreshing then immediately expiring and the lvl
49 song.

Quote:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
I've forwarded the issue to the test and development teams. This is
the first time I've heard of it. Sounds like a timing problem.

It's looking at this time that there might not be a level 49 song.
Geoff poured a bunch of good ideas into the 51+ songs. We would
however be willing to entertain a discussion on this though.

-Gordon
----------------------------------------------------------------------
----------




Rosha, Woodelf Bard
Guildleader, Legends
Innoruuk
